name: Chojinrui - BirdHuman
description:
Support: Oculus Quest 2 (recommend)

Maybe  Quest1 is available, too.

So far, technology has ultimately been about the outside of the human body.

While there have always been imaginings of artificial replacements for the human body, such as cyborgs (although these have been accomplished through plastic surgery, medical treatment, and chip implantation), the existence of one's own body as a physical organism has been a guarantee of reality in today's sea of information. The fact that my body exists as a physical organism (although it is becoming more and more common) is a guarantee of reality in today's sea of information.

This view of the world was the main basis for the ideas of Lacan and others in the 20th century.

However, in the 21st century, VR HMDs have achieved the updating of our own bodies in a very straightforward way.

We no longer have to be what we were born to be.

We faced that fundamental possibility that VR brought to us and approached simulating the physical sensation of a bird in a sincere way.
